repairedDockerfile:
FROM jeanblanchard/java:8
MAINTAINER Jean Blanchard <jean@blanchard.io>

# Expose web port
EXPOSE 8080

# Tomcat Version
ENV TOMCAT_VERSION_MAJOR 9
ENV TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL  9.0.21

# Download and install
RUN apk add --update curl && \
  curl -f -LO http://mirrors.standaloneinstaller.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat-${TOMCAT_VERSION_MAJOR}/v${TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL}/bin/apache-tomcat-${TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL}.tar.gz && \
  curl -f -LO https://www.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-${TOMCAT_VERSION_MAJOR}/v${TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL}/bin/apache-tomcat-${TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL}.tar.gz.sha512 && \
  sha512sum -c apache-tomcat-${TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL}.tar.gz.sha512 && \
  gunzip -c apache-tomcat-${TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL}.tar.gz | tar -xf - -C /opt && \
  rm -f apache-tomcat-${TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL}.tar.gz apache-tomcat-${TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL}.tar.gz.sha512 && \
  ln -s /opt/apache-tomcat-${TOMCAT_VERSION_FULL} /opt/tomcat && \
  rm -rf /opt/tomcat/webapps/examples /opt/tomcat/webapps/docs && \
  apk del curl && \
  rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

# Configuration
ADD tomcat-users.xml /opt/tomcat/conf/
RUN sed -i 's/52428800/5242880000/g' /opt/tomcat/webapps/manager/WEB-INF/web.xml

# Set environment
ENV CATALINA_HOME /opt/tomcat

# Launch Tomcat on startup
CMD ${CATALINA_HOME}/bin/catalina.sh run
